This exceptional item comes with a range of features that are sure to enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be offering. I kindly propose a price of $150 for this product. Thank you for considering my offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150.
